title: which champion to buy?
body: So, i am reaching 4800-6300 ip (Farmed up to 4000 ip atm) and i wanna buy a champ. I have played well as ziggs,azir,diana,fiora but i cant decide. Any ideas?

replies.body: Cho'gath is actually a very good mid laner, if im right he is either god tier or Tier 1 in solo queue. He is pretty cheap too (1350 ip). His Q aoe knockup + slow and W aoe silence are very effective against many mid laners. Cho have quite a good sustain in lane and of course that BS true damage ult which scales with ap (meaning the more AP the more true damage). Cho is also quite tanky even without many tank items and can do well against most matchups.

Then set it up. Create a situation for the enemy where your Q is in their optimal pathing route, forcing them to choose between running toward you or getting knocked up. If they run toward you, you can shout at them and then nom-nom as punishment. It works better if you have a team-mate to back you up.

If you don't see this opportunity, then you probably shouldn't be using Q. W is much better for harass and farming (especially if you're behind).

Use your Q when they turret dive you and Q knockup and make them eat some turret shots and if they are low enough Eat them xD. You can also use your Q to check bushes. A well timed Cho'gath Q can forced a summoner spell from the enemies.  Another suggestion from me is Twisted Fate (although i have never played him b4). Twisted Fate (TF) have an on demand stun on his W (gold card) and he can get mana back from using blue card and he can pressure other lanes very well with his ultimate especially from the mid lane. Another good mid lane champion is Annie (her burst is insane) although she doesn't have a proper escape. Other than that you can try Nunu Ap mid lane although he is not a meta mid lane pick he can snowball pretty hard with an early advantage and his consume gives you pretty good sustain in lane. Fyi nunu's ult have 250% AP scaling ... (u can one shot squishy champs if you can pull of the full channeling)  His E have a 100% Ap scaling but it have quite a long CD tho (around 6 sec).

Azir is good but requires practice to be good. I like his damage, but I find him to be kinda clunky. Just me.

Diana was probably the first assassin I played and like. The only crappy thing is she is like the Assassin version of Xin Zhao. Only dives in and can't leave so you better kill whoever you dived for.
